\documentclass[crop,tikz,convert={outext=.svg,command=\unexpanded{pdf2svg \infile\space\outfile}},multi=false]{standalone}[2012/04/13]
\usepackage{tikz}
\usepackage{pgfplots}
\usetikzlibrary{arrows,shapes,positioning}
\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}
	\begin{scope}
		\node[anchor=south west,inner sep=0] (image) at (0,0) {\includegraphics[width=\textwidth]{uz_per_deskbench_terminal.jpg}};
		\begin{scope}[x={(image.south east)},y={(image.north west)}]
			\draw[blue,ultra thick,rounded corners] (0.37,0.5) rectangle (0.47,0.75);
			\draw[orange,ultra thick,rounded corners] (0.37,0.2) rectangle (0.47,0.47);
			\draw[purple,ultra thick,rounded corners] (0.7,0.55) rectangle (0.9,0.8);
			\draw[black,ultra thick,rounded corners] (0.62,0.17) rectangle (0.99,0.52);
			\node[blue,ultra thick,fill=white,anchor=south] at (0.425,0.65) {\Huge 1};
			\node[orange,ultra thick,fill=white,anchor=south] at (0.425,0.3) {\Huge 2};
			\node[purple,ultra thick,fill=white,anchor=south] at (0.8,0.65) {\Huge 3};
			\node[black,ultra thick,fill=white,anchor=south] at (0.8,0.3) {\Huge 4};
		\end{scope}
	\end{scope}
\end{tikzpicture}%
\end{document}
